mapper.select: SELECT P.*, M.ID FROM TBL_PHOTO P JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON (P.MEMBERNO = M.NO) WHERE P.NO = #{no}

SELECT * FROM TBL_PHOTO WHERE 1=1
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR CONT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND CATEGORY = #{category}
ORDER BY NO DESC

SELECT NO, TITLE, CONT, READCOUNT, CATEGORY, ORIGINALFILE, RENAMEFILE, CREATEDATE, MODIFYDATE, MEMBERNO (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, NO, TITLE, CONT, READCOUNT, CATEGORY, ORIGINALFILE, RENAMEFILE, CREATEDATE, MODIFYDATE, MEMBERNO FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_PHOTO ORDER BY NO DESC)) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PHOTO ( NO, TITLE, CONT, READCOUNT, CATEGORY, ORIGINALFILE, RENAMEFILE, CREATEDATE, MODIFYDATE, MEMBERNO ) VALUES ( PHOTO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{cont}, #{readcount}, #{category}, #{originalfile}, #{renamefile}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{memberno} )
